name: Calaponis
description:
❀ About ❀

Calaponis is a short (~10 minutes) linear science fiction visual novel about relations in a foregone world.
Developed by @IcyValet for Ren'Py Jam. The story is complete but I plan on updating the game with character art in the codex in the future.

CONTENT WARNING: This visual novel contains adult themes.

❀ Story ❀

Chlori works as a farmer at the metro organics facility. One day, while talking to her plants, a coworker interrupts her.
